mav_sim.unit_tests.ch3_derivatives_test module¶

ch3_derivatives_tests.py: Implements some basic tests for the dirivatives funciton.

class mav_sim.unit_tests.ch3_derivatives_test.DynamicsResults¶

Bases: object

Stores the results for the dynamics

mav_sim.unit_tests.ch3_derivatives_test.euler_derivatives_test(tests: list[DynamicsResults]) → bool¶

Test the Euler derivatives, display invalid results

Test the Euler derivatives, display invalid results
